Author: cornsoup123aaaaa
Text: Hey so I read some advice somewhere where instead of counting your good days as a streak that can be broken, you count both good and bad days because then it takes into account the effort you’ve put in and the progress that you’ve already made. And eventually it’ll also be encouraging to look at because of how vastly the good days may outnumber the bad days.

Author: sweetserpents
Text: It’s ok!! Placing too much emphasis on Monday’s or the 1st of the month puts a lot of pressure on you, which makes your brain freak and trigger a binge. Time isn’t real, not really, and you can start over anytime :)
